alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Greene; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 23 at 8:38PM CDT until September 24 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR WESTERN WEBSTER...DALLAS AND GREENE COUNTIES... At 837 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles east of Urbana to near Pleasant Hope to near Ash Grove, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. 60 mph winds reported in Walnut Grove. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Republic, Bennett Spring State Park, Marshfield, Battlefield, Willard, Buffalo, Rogersville, Strafford, Ash Grove, Fair Grove, Conway, Walnut Grove, Urbana, Brookline, Bennett Springs, Louisburg, Windyville, Elkland and Glidewell. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 59 and 111. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
